Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let's design: Nodes: - sr_verify = Transition(label=Verify SR) - cs_setup = Transition(label=Contract Setup) - da_alloc = Transition(label=Datacenter Allocation) - aci_init = Transition(label=Access Control Initialization) Parallel tasks: no ordering between da_alloc and aci_init; but both must be after cs_setup. Then loop node: - bnc = Transition(label=Base Network Configuration) - dr = Transition(label=Debug & Reconfigure) loop_node = OperatorPOWL(operator=Operator.LOOP, children=[bnc, dr]) After loop_node completes (stable), exclusive choice: - cd_deploy = Transition(label=Containerized Deployment) - md_deploy = Transition(label=Monolithic Deployment) choice_node = OperatorPOWL(operator=Operator.XOR, children=[cd_deploy, md_deploy]) Then QA and SA: qa_test = Transition(label=Quality Assurance Tests) sa_audit  = Transition(label=Security Audit) They are concurrent but both before GLA. So we can have partial order edges from qa_test -> gla and sa_audit -> gla; no edge between qa_test and sa_audit. gla_approval=Transition(label=Go-Live Approval)

So our root will have these operator nodes as children along with other transitions.
